title: Removed my post showing a mod was a sham. how is this fair?
body:
so in several post in Player Behavior their "advisor" basically just made snide remarks about how , well were just not that good, or a good player would be able to move up faster then i was doing.

CLEAR shots directly at me.

So I looked up THEIR profile and listed THEIR stats, which were CLEARLY way worse than mine.

SO i get my post removed but its clear that the MOD is allowed to tell players they are bad, and be totally hypocritical. But they don't get in trouble.

Why is it ok for them to say harassing things, but not get called out for it.?

I was toxic, you banned me, now ban them, show us you are TRULY fair. Because we all know you're not...

replies.body:
Hey there.

I took a look into this for you. I can definitely see why the moderator comments in question were ones you felt were attacking you, and I'll have a word about how we can better phrase things to avoid that, as, in-context, it seems pretty apparent that one is an analysis of your behavior from chat logs (which is what was PB is for), and while the other can be read to imply that you're not a good player I think the intent was simply that any player who is actually higher than Bronze in skill (you or someone else) will see their MMR rise reliably if they end up in low Bronze. Definitely room for improvement in communication there though, and I'll make sure that gets through.

Now that that's brought up though -- nothing in that response justifies creating an entire thread just to gameplay-shame someone else. That's a very clear violation of several board rules, and not one we're going to allow.

> Removed my post flaming a mod over semantic crap. how is this fair?

Consider looking at the rules.

And no, banning anyone who calls you out is not 'fair', it is just you being a brat.
You seem to not understand how being in charge works....

> [{quoted}](name=Malfectious,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=MzoMmvO2,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-05-28T20:30:08.384+0000)
>
> You seem to not understand how being in charge works....

Ingsoc is real folks..

i dont think you get the point  they were harassing ME, so i showed him he was WRONG that he was actually the lesser player, but yet MY post gets removed.

Its a case of well, we ignore it because he works for us.  I mean please sign me up, so i can be a dick to someone and get away with it.
